Good morning, #jackrabbitnation,

I have attached a copy of our closure notice that can be found on our school website. www.grafordisd.net
As a district, we are saddened. Our sadness runs deep because #wearegraford. We are a family.

We miss your faces, your stories, and your presence. The halls echo, not with sound, but with silence. We are supposed to teaching, learning, growing together, yet we are interacting from a distance. Whether you are a senior, who should be walking across the stage and springboarding into life, or a kindergartener, who has conquered their ABCs and 123s, we miss your "moments," your "memories," and your "legacies."
